    • Method Detail

      • drawRectangle

        public void drawRectangle(int x,
                 int y,
                 int w,
                 int h)
        Draws the outline of a rectangle. The size of the outline is set with setStroke().
        Parameters:
        x - X-Coordiante of the upper left point
        y - Y-Coordiante of the upper left point
        w - Width of the Rectangle
        h - Height of the Rectangle

      • fillRectangle

        public void fillRectangle(int x,
                 int y,
                 int w,
                 int h)
        Draws a filled Rectangle.
        Parameters:
        x - X-Coordiante of the upper left point
        y - Y-Coordiante of the upper left point
        w - Width of the Rectangle
        h - Height of the Rectangle

      • setColor

        public void setColor(java.awt.Color c)
        Sets the Color. The "brush" keeps the color until another color is set.
        Parameters:
        c - The Color to be drawn width

      • setRandomColor

        public void setRandomColor()
        Sets a Random Color. The "brush" keeps the color until another color is set.

      • setStroke

        public void setStroke(int width)
        Sets the linewidth.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the line.

      • drawLine

        public void drawLine(int x1,
            int y1,
            int x2,
            int y2)
        Draws a Line The Width of the Line is set by setStroke().
        Parameters:
        x1 - X-Coordinate of the start point
        y1 - Y-Coordinate of the start point
        x2 - X-Coordinate of the end point
        y2 - Y-Coordinate of the end point

      • drawVector

        public void drawVector(int x,
              int y,
              int length,
              double angle)
        Draws a line in polar coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - X-Coordinate of the start point
        y - Y-Coordinate of the start point
        length - length of the line
        angle - angle of the line

      • drawOval

        public void drawOval(int x,
            int y,
            int w,
            int h)
        Draws the outline of Oval to the Screen. The size of the outline is set with setStroke(). with width = height you can draw a circle.
        Parameters:
        x - X-Coordinate left upper corner
        y - Y-Coordinate left upper corner
        w - Width
        h - Height

      • fillOval

        public void fillOval(int x,
            int y,
            int w,
            int h)
        Draws a filled Oval to the Screen. with width = height you can draw a circle.
        Parameters:
        x - X-Coordinate of the left upper corner
        y - Y-Coordinate of the left upper corner
        w - Width
        h - Height

      • drawString

        public void drawString(int x,
              int y,
              java.lang.String s)
        Draws a String onto the Screen.
        Parameters:
        x - X-Coordinate for the String
        y - Y-Coordinate for the String
        s - String to be drawn

      • setFont

        public void setFont(java.lang.String name,
           int size)
        Set the font for the drawString method.
        Parameters:

        size - Size of the font
